DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is for recalcitrant hand and foot warts to compare the efficacy of treatment with Intense Pulsed Light and paring versus paring alone.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Recalcitrant Hand and Foot Warts With Intense Pulsed Light - a Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older Recalcitrant warts No previous IPL treatment of warts Immunosuppressive treatment Patients suffering from HIV, diabetes or other immunosuppressive diseases Pregnancy Previous IPL treatment Patients with a tendency to prodyce keloids or hypertrophic scars Mosaic and flat warts Lack of informed consent
